DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: LEN de Almeida;de Almeida, L.;Almeida, L., E., N.,;Luis Eduardo Nunes de Almeida;DE ALMEIDA, LUIS EDUARDO NUNES;Luis E., Nunes de Almeida;Nunes de Almeida, Luis E.;NUNES ALMEIDA, LUIS E.;DE ALMEIDA, LUIZ EDUARDO N.;Almeida, Luiz Eduardo;Almeida, Luiz E.;ALMEIDA, LUIZ

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduao em Engenharia Mecnica pela Universidade de Taubat (1994), Mestrado e Doutorado em Engenharia Aeronutica pelo Instituto Tecnolgico de Aeronutica (2015). Atualmente Gerente de Desenvolvimento do Produto nas reas de Munies e Veicular, na Avibras Indstria Aeroespacial S.A. Tem experincia na rea de Desenvolvimento de Produtos, Engenharia de Sistemas e Processos de Manufatura. Possui experincia em propulso de motor foguete slido, turbomquinas com nfase em turbojatos, materiais compsitos estruturais e ablativos, materiais cermicos, polmeros, propelentes slido tipo composite, cabeas de guerra, explosivos, materiais energticos, camuflagem, blindagem, sistemas de atuao de msseis e integrao final de subsistemas.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Graduated in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Taubat (1994), Master of Science and Doctor of Science (PhD) in Aeronautical Engineering from the Technological Institute of Aeronautics (2015).Currently is Product Development Manager in the Ammunition and Vehicle areas at Avibras Indstria Aeroespacial S.A.The main expertise are Product Development, Systems Engineering and Manufacturing Processes. Expertise on the following areas: solid rocket motor propulsion, turbomachinery with emphasis on small turbines, structural and ablative composites, ceramic materials, polymers, solid rocket propellants, warheads, explosives, energetic materials, camouflage, armour systems, missile actuators and final subsystems integration.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES: Strong experience in Product Development Engineering in the following areas of knowledge: Rocket motor design, internal ballistics, propellants formulations, mechanical systems for guidance and control, turbomachines (turbojet), wings design, missile control surfaces, electromechanical actuators and thermal batteries. Turbomachinery, turbojets for missile applications. Missiles and guided rockets design and systems integration. Propulsion performance simulations. Pyrotechnic systems, warheads, EFP ammunition, igniters, gas generators and in-flight decoupling systems. Design and process of structural composites for aeronautical and aerospace applications. Solid and flexible thermal insulation. Expertise in tactical missiles design in terms of conception, design, manufacturing and qualification for Defense and Space products. Systems Engineering since the Concept, Development, Production, Operation and Retirement stages. International Experience: Republic of South Africa (3 years) Bi-national project between Brazilian Air Force, Brazilian and South African companies. Responsible for the transfer of technology (ToT). The ToT was related with propulsion system technologies, warhead and mechanical systems for flight guidance (TVC) for the SRAAM Missile 5th Generation "A-Darter". The activities were performed at Rheinmetall Denel Munition and Denel Dynamics. (2009 to 2011). Indonesia (5 years) - Responsible for the Offset program (ToT) in order to improve the R-Han 122 artillery rocket to the Ministry of Defense of Indonesia (2015 to 2019). France (09 years) - Participation in the Offset program of Brazilian Navy related with the propulsion systems for the anti-ship missiles MM40 and AM39 from MBDA Company (2011 to 2019).

ESPECIALIZACAO.NOME-CURSO: Ps graduao Latu Sensu em Qumica

MESTRADO.TITULO-DA-DISSERTACAO-TESE: Obteno e caracterizao de compsitos ablativos de matriz fenlica e fenlica modificada com epxi, com reforo de fibra de carbono picada.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Materiais e Processos para Engenharia Aeronutica e Aeroespacial

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-SUB-AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Materiais e Processos para Engenharia Aeronutica e Aeroespacial

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Superviso de Produo, responsvel por Desenvolvimento de produtos, Mtodos e Processos de fabricao, ensaios mecnicos, anlises qumicas e determinao de parmetros especficos de propulso de motor foguete.

Supervisor de Engenharia de Produto, atuando nas seguintes reas de conhecimento: Projeto de motor foguete, balstica interna de motor foguete, sistemas mecnicos de guiagem e controle de veculos aeroespacial. Simulaes de desempenho de sistemas propulsores. Sistemas pirotcnicos, cargas ocas, ogivas, cabeas de guerra, munies EFP, ignitores, geradores de gs e sistemas de desacoplamento em vo. Projeto e processo de peas em materiais compsitos estruturais e compsitos ablativos para emprego aeronutico e aeroespacial. Protees trmicas slidas e flexveis. Projeto de cabeas de guerra para Msseis Tticos. Experincia desde a concepo do projeto, processo, fabricao e qualificao de produtos aeronuticos e aeroespaciais at a fase final de qualificao ou homologao, junto aos rgos certificadores.
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Product Engineering Supervisor with expertise on the following areas of knowledge: Design of rocket motor, internal ballistics of rocket motor, mechanical systems of guidance and control of aerospace vehicles. Performance simulations of propulsive systems. Pyrotechnic systems, warheads, EFP ammunition, igniters, gas generators and in-flight decoupling systems. Design and process of structural composite materials and ablative materials for aeronautical and aerospace employment. Solid and flexible thermal insulation materials and design. Head of Tactical Missiles design. Experience from the conception of the design, process, manufacture and qualification of aeronautical and aerospace products until the qualification or homologation, with the certifying bodies.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Republic of South Africa: Responsible for the transfer of technology process during 3 years. The main activities were carried out on the propulsion system technology, warhead and mechanical systems of flight guidance of the SRAAM Missile 5th Generation "A Darter". Bi-national project between Brazilian Air Force, Brazilian and South African companies. The activities were carried out at Rheinmetall Denel Munition (Germany Company) and Denel Dynamics (South Africa Company). (2009 to 2011).
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Republic of South Africa: Responsible for the transfer of technology process during 3 years. The main activities were carried out on the propulsion system technology, warhead and mechanical systems of flight guidance of the SRAAM Missile 5th Generation "A Darter". Bi-national project between Brazilian Air Force, Brazilian and South African companies. The activities were carried out at Rheinmetall Denel Munition (Germany Company) and Denel Dynamics (South Africa Company). (2009 to 2011).

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Professor contratado para ministrar aulas na Engenharia Mecnica na rea de Transferncia de Calor e Mecnica dos Slidos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Participao nos capitulos: Chapter 10 Thermal Decomposition Kinetics Studies of HTPB/Al/AP Solid Propellants Formulated With Iron Oxide Burning Rate Catalyst in Nano and Micro Scale (pages 211-233) Luis Eduardo Nunes Almeida Chapter 11 Study of Factors Influencing the Life Predictions of Solid Rocket Motor (pages 234-245) Ricardo Viera Binda, Roberta Jachura Rocha, Luiz Eduardo Nunes Almeida
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
In the last decade, there has been an influx in the development of new technologies for deep space exploration. Countries all around the world are investing in resources to create advanced energetic materials and propulsion systems for their aerospace initiatives.
Energetic Materials Research, Applications, and New Technologies is an essential reference source of the latest research in aerospace engineering and its application in space exploration. Featuring comprehensive coverage across a range of related topics, such as molecular dynamics, rocket engine models, propellants and explosives, and quantum chemistry calculations, this book is an ideal reference source for academicians, researchers, advanced-level students, and technology developers seeking innovative research in aerospace engineering.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Aperfeioamento em gro propelente slido para motor foguete uma combinao de dois tipos de propelente, sendo o interno um propelente base dupla e o externo um propelente do tipo composite, com finalidade de apresentar durante a combusto dois tipos de comportamento de chama e gases, sendo o primeiro smokeless e o segundo classificao BC STANAG.
